DefaultTexts.Name: InvalidCategory
DefaultTexts.Text: The chosen category is not present in the list of available categories.

DefaultTexts.Name: ExclusiveCategory
DefaultTexts.Text: Category {category} cannot be used together with other categories

DefaultTexts.Name: TooManyDigitsFraction
DefaultTexts.Text: Answer {answer} has too many fractional digits, maximum is {maximumDigits}

DefaultTexts.Name: AnswerTooLong
DefaultTexts.Text: Answer {answer} is too long, maximum is {numberOfCharacters}

DefaultTexts.Name: MoreThanMaximum
DefaultTexts.Text: Answer {answer} is too big, maximum is {maximum}

DefaultTexts.Name: LessThanMinimum
DefaultTexts.Text: Answer {answer} is too small, minimum is {minimum}

DefaultTexts.Name: TooManyDigitsInIntegerPart
DefaultTexts.Text: Answer {answer} has too many digits, maximum is {maximum}

DefaultTexts.Name: NotInRange
DefaultTexts.Text: Answer {answer} is not in the permitted range, permitted range is {range}

DefaultTexts.Name: DoNotUseBrowserButtonToNavigate
DefaultTexts.Text: Do not use browser navigation buttons, use interview buttons instead

DefaultTexts.Name: DoNotUseButtonWithOtherAnswer
DefaultTexts.Text: The answer "{item}" cannot be used in conjunction with other answers
